title: verify NEWS links work
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on mlb site on a browser
custom_steps: WHEN I hover over to NEWS link
custom_expected: THEN I should see the following links: Rule Changes, Probable Pitchers, Starting Lineups, Transactions, Injury Report, World Baseball Classic, MLB Draft, All-Star Game, MLB Life, MLB Pipeline, Postseason History, Podcasts

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to NEWS link
AND I click on "Rule Changes"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the rule changes page loading

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to NEWS link
AND I click on "Probable Pitchers"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the probable pitchers page loading

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to NEWS link
AND I click on "Starting Lineups"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the starting lineups page loading

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to NEWS link
AND I click on "Transactions"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see transactions page loading

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to NEWS link
AND I click on "Injury Report"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see Injury Report page loading

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to NEWS link
AND I click on "World Baseball Classic"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see world baseball classic page loading

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to NEWS link
AND I click on "MLB Draft"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see mlb draft page loading

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to NEWS link
AND I click on "All-Star Game"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see all-star game loading

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to NEWS link
AND I click on "MLB Life"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see mlb life page loading

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to NEWS link
AND I click on "MLB Pipeline"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the mlb pipeline loading

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to NEWS link
AND I click on "Postseason History"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the postseason history page loading

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to NEWS link
AND I click on "Podcasts"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see podcasts page loading

title: verify WATCH links work
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on mlb site on a browser
custom_steps: WHEN I hover over to "WATCH" link in the header
custom_expected: THEN I should see the following links: Search, Statcast, MLB Network, MLB Originals, Buy MLB.TV, Watch & Listen, Help Center

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to "WATCH" link
AND I click on "Search"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "Video" page loading
AND I should see the url containing "video" in it

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to "WATCH" link
AND I click on "Statcast"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the "Statcast" page loading

custom_steps_separated.content:

AND I click on "MLB Network"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the "MLB Network" page loading

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to "WATCH" link
AND I click on "MLB Originals"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the "MLB Originals" page loading

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to "WATCH" link
AND I click on "Buy MLB.TV"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the "Buy MLB.TV" page loading

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to "WATCH" link
AND I click on "Watch & Listen"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the "Watch & Listen" page loading

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to "WATCH" link
AND I click on "Help Center"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the "Help Center" page loading

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to "WATCH" link
AND I click on ""
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the "" page loading

custom_expected:
THEN I should see the "scores" page loading

title: verify SCHEDULE links work
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on mlb site on a browser
custom_steps: WHEN I hover over to "SCHEDULE" link in the header
custom_expected: THEN I should see the following links: 2023 Regular Season, 2023 Spring Training, 2023 World Baseball Classic, 2022 Postseason, MLB Events, Team by Team Schedule

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to "SCHEDULE" link
AND I click on "2023 Regular Season"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "schedule" page loading
AND I should see the url containing "schedule" in it

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to "SCHEDULE" link
AND I click on "2023 Spring Training"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "schedule" page loading
AND I should see the url containing "schedule" in it
AND I should see the spring schedule

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to "SCHEDULE" link
AND I click on "2023 World Baseball Classic"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "world-baseball-classic" page loading
AND I should see the url containing "world-baseball-classic" in it
AND I should see the final game result for "world-baseball-classic"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to "SCHEDULE" link
AND I click on "2022 Postseason"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "postseason" page loading
AND I should see the url containing "postseason" in it

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to "SCHEDULE" link
AND I click on "MLB Events"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "events" page loading
AND I should see the url containing "events" in it

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I hover over to "SCHEDULE" link
AND I click on "Team by Team Schedule"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "schedule/team-by-team" page loading
AND I should see the url containing "schedule/team-by-team" in it

title: MLB PLAY: Verify each of the submenu items in MLB PLAY produces a 200.
Verify high level main header items
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on MLB homepage
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the news page load
AND the url should contain /news

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click on "WATCH"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "MLB.TV" page load
AND the url should contain /live-stream-games

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click on "SCORES"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "SCORES" page load
AND the url should contain /scores

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click on "SCHEDULE"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "SCHEDULES" page load
AND the url should contain ".*"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click on "STATS"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "STATS" page load
AND the url should contain /stats

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click on "STANDINGS"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "STANDINGS" page load
AND the url should contain /standings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click on "YOUTH"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "YOUTH BASEBALL" page load
AND the url should contain /youth-baseball-softball

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click on "PLAYERS"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "PLAYERS" page load
AND the url should contain /players

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click on "MLB PLAY"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "MLB PLAY" page load
AND the url should contain /play

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click on "MLB.TV"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "MLB.TV" page load
AND the url should contain /live-stream-games/

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click on "TICKETS"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "TICKETS" page load
AND the url should contain /tickets

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click on "SHOP"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "MLB SHOP" page load
AND the url should contain mlbshop.com

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click on "TEAMS"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the "TEAMS" page load
AND the url should contain /team
